product_name: REI Nylon Duffel Bag - XX Large - Special Buy
long_description: Cavernous only begins to describe the REI XX Large REI Nylon Duffel Bag, which swallows up 9,150 cu. in. worth of gear, clothing or whatever else you can fit in it, and comes with its own stuff sack. 420-denier ripstop nylon is lightweight and tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the included adjustable shoulder strap. The REI XX Large REI Nylon Duffel Bag has a convenient storage sack that doubles as a toiletry bag. Special buy.
short_description: Cavernous only begins to describe the REI XX Large REI Nylon Duffel Bag, which swallows up 9,150 cu. in. worth of gear, clothing or whatever else you can fit in it, and comes with its own stuff sack.
